title: I drew Nightraven Fiora for 17 RP
body: Nightraven Fiora looks really cool.  I got a a skin shard of it. So I drew it for RP. I am 17 RP short of 125 RP. It will be fantastic if Riot could help. Thanks.

replies.body:
YOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOO That is LEGIT!!

I love the color choices honestly, gonna steal this combo for my Octavia Warframe hmmmm.....


Be sure to check your RP totals the next time you login ^_^!!!
ahhh thank you so much! I actually saw the change to the RP just before I entered Champ select lol. Again, thank you!
Deez poros work quick when we can ^_^
